name: Thalheimer & Weitz v. R. M. Luff Construction Company (et al., Appellant)

judges: Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.

parties: Thalheimer & Weitz v. R. M. Luff Construction Company (et al., Appellant).

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

Andrew B. Cantor, with him Robert K. Greenfield, Goodis, Greenfield, Warm <& Mann, and Wisler, Pearlstine, Talone, Craig & Garrity, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Thalheimer & Weitz v. R. M. Luff Construction Company (et al., Appellant).
Argued April 29, 1971.
Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
David E. Thomas, with him Raspin, Espenshade, Hems & Erskine, for appellant.
Andrew B. Cantor, with him Robert K. Greenfield, Goodis, Greenfield, Warm <& Mann, and Wisler, Pearlstine, Talone, Craig & Garrity, for appellee.
October 12, 1971:
